pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Case 1 Best-Worst Scaling // Provides basic functions that support an implementation of object case (Case 1) best- worst scaling: a function for converting a two-level orthogonal main-effect design/balanced incomplete block design into questions; two functions for creating a data set suitable for analysis; a function for calculating count-based scores; a function for calculating shares of preference; and a function for generating artificial responses to questions. See Louviere et al. (2015) doi:10.1017/CBO9781107337855 for details on best- worst scaling, and Aizaki and Fogarty (2023) doi:10.1016/j.jocm.2022.100394 for the package.
